Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/37th
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California buses are temp rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th and California: due to, street blockage near California/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th, California and over regular route: due to, street blockage near California/37th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan & #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at Michigan/112th
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan & #19 Michigan/119th buses temp. rerouted via Michigan, 111th, State, 115th & Michigan, due to fire department activity near Michigan/112th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan and #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 111th, State, 115th, then resume their normal routes on Michigan, due to fire department activity near Michigan/112th.

Allow extra travel time.
